comments.author: Terry
comments.body: well the skinny tire foolz really put down the beating on us fat tire freaks... little known fact though: dave is really only 24 years old (just spent too much time in the sun) and each of his legs is 6 feet long. also, steve has a third lung. SHHH!! don't tell anyone. terry

comments.author: Dennis
comments.body: Any chance you freds want to ride next Tuesday at noonish? The old slow one, Dennis

comments.author: Linda
comments.body: So where were the fellow freds today - it was just me up against Dennis and Steve. I need more company at the back... -Linda

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I'm glad I had a good excuse today... and I didn't even have to make it up. Hoping Linda and Dennis can join us again before my next knee surgery! Fred... er...Dave

comments.author: Terry
comments.body: sorry i missed it... had to help the dean here w/ some last-minute issues before her presentation downtown. when the dean calls, the bike stalls! (or something like that). ;-) terry

comments.author: Terry
comments.body: P.S. so are you riding sunshine canyon friday? FYI, there is an all-you-can-eat pancake breakfast at the UMC grill... sounds like a chance for some carbo loading! i'm tentatively up for a ride friday. terry

comments.author: Dennis
comments.body: All, I think we should insist that Dave take the http://www.realage.com/ test to prove his real age. Dennis

comments.author: Linda
comments.body: So how about a ride up Magnolia sometime soon? -Linda
